activity.name: When you pre-screened Ms. Jones’ documents, you determined that she didn’t have all of the documentation required to proceed with the activity.
activity.description: When you pre-screened Ms. Jones’ documents, you determined that she didn’t have all of the documentation required to proceed with the activity.

activity.name: Even though Ms. Jones is unhappy that you can’t accept the photocopy of the MCO …
activity.description: Even though Ms. Jones is unhappy that you can’t accept the photocopy of the MCO …

activity.name: The fact that you pre-screened the documents is going to save both you and Ms. Jones a lot of time!
activity.description: The fact that you pre-screened the documents is going to save both you and Ms. Jones a lot of time!

activity.name: Because you didn’t start an activity in Tapestry first, and then discover the missing documentation later!
activity.description: Because you didn’t start an activity in Tapestry first, and then discover the missing documentation later!

activity.name:
Notice of Additional Requirements Letter
You’re going to generate a Notice of Additional Requirements letter from Tapestry.
activity.description:
Notice of Additional Requirements Letter
You’re going to generate a Notice of Additional Requirements letter from Tapestry.

activity.name: Start a new transaction in Tapestry so the Notice of Additional Requirements letter can be generated for the customer.
activity.description: Start a new transaction in Tapestry so the Notice of Additional Requirements letter can be generated for the customer.

activity.name:
90 DAYS
This activity can be saved in Tapestry for 90 days.
activity.description:
90 DAYS
This activity can be saved in Tapestry for 90 days.

activity.name: The letter lists the required documents or missing information the customer will need to gather and bring back to the office to complete their request.
activity.description: The letter lists the required documents or missing information the customer will need to gather and bring back to the office to complete their request.

activity.name:
10 Days
The customer will have 10 days to return to the office with the required documents or information.
activity.description:
10 Days
The customer will have 10 days to return to the office with the required documents or information.

activity.name:
Go to the head of the line!
The customer will not have to wait in line again when they return to the office.
activity.description:
Go to the head of the line!
The customer will not have to wait in line again when they return to the office.

activity.name: And that should help save them some valuable time!
activity.description: And that should help save them some valuable time!

activity.name: Which is an important part of our mission!
activity.description: Which is an important part of our mission!
